arts.sum: Celtic's European campaign gets underway at last as Kazakh side Kairat come to town

arts.ttl: Celtic v Kairat Almaty, Champions League Playoff – Team News, match officials and where to watch
arts.sum: Celtic face Kairat Almaty in the UEFA Champions League Playoff First Leg this evening at Celtic Park. The Scottish Champions will be looking to make significant progress in their attempt to secure their progress to the League Phase of Europe’s premier competition with a strong performance to secure a comfortable lead to take into the Read More

arts.ttl: Who will win Celtic vs Kairat Almaty? Our writers deliver predictions for Champions League playoff first leg
arts.sum: Celtic have overcome Kazakhstan opposition on three previous occasions in Champions League qualifying

arts.sum: Brendan Rodgers' side are just 180 minutes away from joining Europe's elite for a fourth year in a row

arts.ttl: Kairat Almaty’s belief that they can upset Celtic in Champions League Playoff
arts.sum: Kairat Almaty midfielder Valery Gromyko insists that a surprise league defeat ahead of their long journey to Glasgow will not affect their belief that they can upset Celtic in the Champions League play-offs… Kairat aiming to make history Celtic welcome Kairat tomorrow night, with the visitors aiming to make history as the first Kazakh side Read More
